original_text: The men had been seated before him in the order of their ages, from the firstborn to the youngest; and they looked at each other in astonishment.
korean_text: 그들이 요셉 앞에 앉되 그들의 나이에 따라 앉히게 되니 그들이 서로 이상히 여겼더라

sentences.original_text: The men had been seated before him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 그의 앞에 앉아 있었다

sentences.original_text: in the order of their ages
from the firstborn to the youngest
and they looked at each other
